title: cli: dataflow: digram: Exception when visualizing MNIST dataflow
body:
```console
$ dffml dataflow create multiply associate_definition -config yaml     -seed '{"image": "product"}'=associate_spec 0.00392156862=multiplier_def |     sed -ze 's/multiplicand:\n      - seed/multiplicand:\n      - seed:\n        - image/g' |  dffml dataflow diagram /dev/stdin -config yaml
graph TD

    load_entry_point('dffml', 'console_scripts', 'dffml')()

    result = loop.run_until_complete(cls._main(*argv[1:]))

TypeError: sequence item 1: expected str instance, list found
```
